categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Futrad was a female Twi'lek Jedi Master who served the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order during the Cold War with the Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard the space station Carrick Station.

Futrad appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Recruit PvP Gear Vendor for the Jedi Knight class, though she was later removed during a reorganization of the gear system.
